task_list.name: Threshold Segmentation
task_list.docs_info:
### Purpose
- Description of task functionality: Threshold an image and find connected components.
- Bullet points that cover main features of the tasks.
- Can use **full** *markdown* formatting (including embedding images).

### Outputs
- Optional section on what kind of outputs the task generates. For the thresholding_task: Generates a new label image named `label_name`.

### Limitations
- List known limitations of the task (e.g. only works for certain data types).

mode.title: Mode
mode.description: Specifies how to interpret the identifier. Can be "label", "wavelength_id", or "index" (must be an integer).

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: Unique identifier for the channel. This can be a channel label, wavelength ID, or index.

masking.title: Masking Iterator Configuration
masking.description: If configured, the segmentation will be only saved within the mask region.

roi_table.title: Iterate Over ROIs
roi_table.description: Name of a ROI table. If provided, the segmentation will be performed for each ROI in the specified ROI table.

mode.title: Mode
mode.description: Mode of masking to be applied. If "Table Name", the identifier refers to a masking table name. If "Label Name", the identifier refers to a label image name.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: Name of the masking table or label image depending on the mode.

channel.title: Channel
channel.description: Select the input channel to be used for segmentation.

label_name.title: Label Name
label_name.description: Name of the resulting label image. If not provided, it will be set to "<channel_identifier>_thresholded".

min_size.title: Min Size
min_size.description: Minimum size of objects. Smaller objects are filtered out.

iterator_configuration.title: Iterator Configuration
iterator_configuration.description: Advanced configuration to control masked and ROI-based iteration.

overwrite.title: Overwrite
overwrite.description: Whether to overwrite an existing label image. Defaults to True.
